name: Isle of the Lost Blade
description:
Isle of the Lost Blade is a fast-paced FPS where S is for sword. Teleport, slash and shoot your way through an army of pirate robots who are determined to steal your magic blade and wreak havoc on the island.

Inspired by old-school adventure/platformers such as Banjo Kazooie and action games such as Turok and Quake.

Unlock new moves, wall-run, jump, dash, and ground-slam your way to defend your magical sword, all while discovering isle natives, new places, and exploring your surroundings.

  • Teleport to your sword at will
  • Use combos to deal massive damage
  • Wall run, mantle, and dash across obstacles
  • Explore an exotic world full of secrets, dangers, and treasure

* Currently in development *

Join our Discord for more updates & to leave feedback on our first demo!

Follow us on Twitter, Instagram and visit our website for updates!
